description: When serious weather threatens and there's nowhere to hide, you need uncompromising protection. The Exposure/2™ Gore-Tex Pro Lite Jacket lifts the weight of worry off your shoulders when unrelenting rain, snow, and other gnarly conditions are thrown your way—without weighing you down with secondary features. The most durable, protective shell, built with industry-leading, bluesign®-approved Gore-tex, and stripped down to just the necessities. It withstands Mother Nature's worst while remaining incredibly breathable.
name: Mountain Hardwear Exposure/2 GTX Pro LT Jacket - Mens
